weeks.title: Welcome Home & Bonding
weeks.focus: Build trust, start routines, and make training fun from day one.

weeks.title: First Cues & Alone Time
weeks.focus: Begin simple cues and short independence practice.

weeks.title: Down & Leave-It Foundations
weeks.focus: Introduce impulse control and polite behaviour.

weeks.title: Recall & Confidence
weeks.focus: Strengthen response to your call and build trust in crate time.

weeks.title: Leash & Calm Greetings
weeks.focus: Introduce walking gear and polite social manners.

weeks.title: Stay Foundations & Focus
weeks.focus: Introduce the concept of staying put and building focus around mild distractions.

weeks.title: Stay Progression & Calm on Mat
weeks.focus: Add duration and tiny distance to Stay; introduce the settle-on-mat behavior.

weeks.title: Loose-Leash Basics & Leave-It 2
weeks.focus: Start leash manners indoors and add difficulty to Leave-It.

weeks.title: Public Manners Foundations
weeks.focus: Transition skills toward the outdoors: polite doorways and early leash work outside.

weeks.title: Vet Prep & Cat Supervision (Optional)
weeks.focus: Build cooperative care skills and begin calm, gated cat sessions if applicable.

weeks.title: Distraction Work 1 & Alone Time 2
weeks.focus: Introduce mild distractions and extend comfortable separations.

weeks.title: Loose-Leash Outdoors & Focus Around Dogs
weeks.focus: Practice calm walking outside and attentive behavior near other dogs.

weeks.title: Distraction Proofing & Household Harmony
weeks.focus: Raise criteria for attention, door manners, and independence.
